channel.title: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering, so I have a 718 Matrix source (Rune-evo), and I added my own custom dialogue quest type thing and I was wondering if there is a way to not let a player do the quest over and over again. I can post [b]anything[/b] if needed.
-Thanks in advance!

item.title: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

you need to write it in the character file

Read full topic
item.source: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice

item.title: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:533247”][quote author=Bl3nd link=topic=652041.msg4370001#msg4370001 date=1380404538]

store a variable to the account
check for the variable at beginning of quest
change the variable after quest

Ok so I somewhat get what your saying, I just don’t know what the variable would be. Like public int blah = something;
or what?
[/quote]

boolean fagQuestFinished;

Set it on true when they finished it and save it to their account file.
Add a check on starting the quest that the boolean has to be flagged false to be able to start the quest.[/quote]
nice boolean name. And that’s all I wanted, to know how to set it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice

item.title: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:3, topic:533247”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=652041.msg4370000#msg4370000 date=1380404338]
store a variable to the account
check for the variable at beginning of quest
change the variable after quest
[/quote]

Ok so I somewhat get what your saying, I just don’t know what the variable would be. Like public int blah = something;
or what?[/quote]

boolean fagQuestFinished;

Set it on true when they finished it and save it to their account file.
Add a check on starting the quest that the boolean has to be flagged false to be able to start the quest.

Read full topic
item.source: How to not let anyone do a npc dialogue quest twice
